author: markt
msg: No need to restore the URI or the query string. This has already been done when constructing the redirect that got us here in the first place.

author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-6423] Fix Config strings for throwing RegionOverloadedExceptions
Noticed that the config strings were not set correctly for the HBase-6423
diff. Fix the config strings for HBASE-6423.
MR tests. Test on the unicorn test cluster for blocking

author: mbautin
msg: 1. ability to change RPC compression on the fly
2. put an option to enable RPC tx/rx compression in loadtest tool
3. bugfix: call returnCompressor/returnDecompressor to return codecs to CodecPool

author: mbautin
msg: [private] Small change to build hbase against alligator.
The constructor for LocalFileSystem was changed in
https://phabricator.fb.com/D401312 to throw an IOException. Making a
small change to hbase so that we can compile against alligator HDFS.
1) Build hbase with alligator HDFS, hadoop-hive and Titan

author: rmuir
msg: fix broken javadocs (javacc bug) by regenerating with latest version, fix broken links in .javacc (reintroduced if you regenerate)
